text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Racing's finest are gathered here for<n>the 3,000-meter turf
G2 Hanshin<n>Daishoten.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's excited for the face-off<n>between Racers of the
Year Narita<n>Brian and Mayano Top Gun!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The extraordinary crowd at the<n>Hanshin Racecourse is
waiting with<n>bated breath to see the amazing<n>finish to
come!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Something about this feels different<n>from Brian's other
races.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Until now we've only been<n>bystanders overwhelmed by
Brian's<n>achievements.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But now... things are different, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Race with all your spirit, Brian. And<n>we'll cheer for you with
all of ours.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I will... Thanks.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We'd better get to the stands then! I<n>saved us one heck of
a spot!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
All right, Brian, you should head for<n>the paddock. Come on,
I'll walk you<n>over.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Okay... I'm off then.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You've got this, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We wish you all the best.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ah! Here she is!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You look like you're ready. Your<n>desire to run is written all
over your<n>face.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm itching to test the results of<n>training with you two.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I don't need to say how skilled<n>Mayano Top Gun is, but
your real<n>opponent today will be yourself.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: A one-on-one match against<n>yourselfâ€”you'd better win!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I got this.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You've amazed me on countless<n>occasions. Fantastic
times, surprising<n>finishes, victories in the biggest<n>races...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You've amazed me on countless<n>occasions. Fantastic
times, surprising<n>finishes, victories in the biggest<n>races...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I know you're going to continue<n>to amaze me.
Nothing's ever<n>dampened your drive to win since I<n>met
you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I know you're going to continue<n>to amaze me.
Nothing's ever<n>dampened your drive to win since I<n>met
you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh... I won't disappoint!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So many people are here! They must<n>be excited to see this<n>
Racer-of-the-Year showdown!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And I'm right there with them! I can't<n>wait to race you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I see...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
If I'm not mistaken, you can't pull off<n>the running style you
used before<n>your injury.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But your passion for racing is still<n>there! Your feelings
haven't changed<n>at all!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: So I've got to race at full throttle too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Hm... It wouldn't be right to say my<n>feelings haven't
changed at all.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I used to run like winning was<n>inevitable. But when winning
stopped<n>being a given, it started to feel<n>impossible.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yet the farther away victory seemed,<n>the hungrier I got.
Every time it slipped<n>through my fingers, it's like my heart<n>
was set ablaze over and over.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I am now burning to win!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Great! But I won't lose, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Good, I'm counting on it!
